title: Enhancing App Development Practice Competencies: Intermediate Chinese Communication Utilizing VR-Based Productive Failure

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners apply situational communication strategies (e.g., self-correction, contextual inference) with 80% accuracy or higher in VR environments.
Learners generate three or more creative language transformation examples during problem-solving stages utilizing their native language (L1).
Reduce the use of resource-deficiency-related strategies (word repetition, simple responses) by 40% after VR learning
Achieve a VR learning immersion score of 4.0/5.0 or higher through formative assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
